release.action: Changed the survey module so that users can answer without being logged in. The description text can now be displayed.
Changed excel results to include user that answered and fixed the column layout of the answers.
Added dependency between questions, logging of user that answers survey and more.
Fixed SurveyResultEditor to show excel sheet with all answers.
Fixed SurveyCSS and other classes to get the survey to work on nest.
Updating and fixing dependencies to create a new sunnan3 application.
Built version to be used with ePlatform release 3.1
Declaration of version for use with core 3.0.5
